name: twitter-regex-mention
description: no dot matching, 100% twitter compatible mentions regex 2015
content:
// should match `bar_baz`
foo @bar_baz qux

// should match `_bar_baz`
foo @_bar_baz qux

// should match `_bar`
foo @_bar baz qux

// the `/` case
foo @bar/baz qux    // should match `bar/baz`
foo @/bar/baz qux   // should not match
foo @/bar baz qux   // should not match
foo /@bar/baz qux   // should match `bar/baz`
foo /@bar baz qux   // should match `bar`

// should match `bar` only
////////////////////////////
foo @222 baz qux
foo @bar baz qux
foo @bar.baz qux
foo @bar,baz qux
foo @bar!baz qux
foo @bar#baz qux
foo @bar$baz qux
foo @bar%baz qux
foo @bar^baz qux
foo @bar&baz qux
foo @bar*baz qux
foo @bar(baz qux
foo @bar)baz qux
foo @bar{baz qux
foo @bar}baz qux
foo @bar<baz qux
foo @bar>baz qux
foo @bar[baz qux
foo @bar]baz qux
foo @bar=baz qux
foo @bar+baz qux
foo @bar-baz qux
foo @bar`baz qux
foo @bar\baz qux
foo @bar:baz qux
foo @bar;baz qux
foo @bar?baz qux
foo @bar~baz qux
foo @bar|baz qux
foo @bar"baz qux
foo @bar'baz qux

foo .@bar.baz qux
foo ,@bar,baz qux
foo ^@bar^baz qux
foo )@bar(baz qux
foo (@bar)baz qux
foo {@bar{baz qux
foo }@bar}baz qux
foo <@bar<baz qux
foo >@bar>baz qux
foo [@bar[baz qux
foo ]@bar]baz qux
foo =@bar=baz qux
foo +@bar+baz qux
foo -@bar-baz qux
foo `@bar`baz qux
foo \@bar\baz qux
foo :@bar:baz qux
foo ;@bar;baz qux
foo ?@bar?baz qux
foo ~@bar~baz qux
foo |@bar|baz qux
foo "@bar"baz qux
foo '@bar'baz qux


// should not match
////////////////////
foo bar@baz qux
foo bar@baz.qux
foo bar@baz.qux:beta/gama
foo @ bar baz qux
foo @.bar.baz qux
foo @,bar,baz qux
foo @!bar!baz qux
foo @#bar#baz qux
foo @$bar$baz qux
foo @%bar%baz qux
foo @^bar^baz qux
foo @&bar&baz qux
foo @*bar*baz qux
foo @)bar(baz qux
foo @(bar)baz qux
foo @{bar{baz qux
foo @}bar}baz qux
foo @<bar<baz qux
foo @>bar>baz qux
foo @[bar[baz qux
foo @]bar]baz qux
foo @=bar=baz qux
foo @+bar+baz qux
foo @-bar-baz qux
foo @`bar`baz qux
foo @\bar\baz qux
foo @:bar:baz qux
foo @;bar;baz qux
foo @?bar?baz qux
foo @~bar~baz qux
foo @|bar|baz qux
foo @"bar"baz qux
foo @'bar'baz qux

foo @.bar baz qux
foo @,bar baz qux
foo @!bar baz qux
foo @#bar baz qux
foo @$bar baz qux
foo @%bar baz qux
foo @^bar baz qux
foo @&bar baz qux
foo @*bar baz qux
foo @)bar baz qux
foo @(bar baz qux
foo @{bar baz qux
foo @}bar baz qux
foo @<bar baz qux
foo @>bar baz qux
foo @[bar baz qux
foo @]bar baz qux
foo @=bar baz qux
foo @+bar baz qux
foo @-bar baz qux
foo @`bar baz qux
foo @\bar baz qux
foo @:bar baz qux
foo @;bar baz qux
foo @?bar baz qux
foo @~bar baz qux
foo @|bar baz qux
foo @"bar baz qux
foo @'bar baz qux

foo 2@222 baz qux
foo 2@bar baz qux
foo !@bar!baz qux
foo #@bar#baz qux
foo $@bar$baz qux
foo %@bar%baz qux
foo &@bar&baz qux
foo *@bar*baz qux
foo _@bar_baz qux
foo _@bar baz qux
author: tunnckoCore
